MONODRIFT

A minimalist drifting experience with your custom car model

Controls:

  • Arrow Up/Down or WASD: Accelerate/Brake
  • Arrow Left/Right: Steer
  • SPACE: Drift (hold while turning)
  • SHIFT: Nitro Boost
  • R: Restart

Mobile controls will appear automatically on touch devices

Click/tap to start
